trans-unit.source: Represents a geographical location that is determined by latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 表示由纬度和经度坐标确定的地理位置。

trans-unit.source: May also include altitude, accuracy, speed, and course information.
trans-unit.target: 也可以包括海拔高度、精度、速度和航向信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate." />
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate." /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> that has no data fields set.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 的新实例，不设置数据字段。

trans-unit.source: All data fields are set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 所有数据字段都设置为<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: The new instance of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> is equivalent to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>等效于<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor should be used for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数应该用于序列化。

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: 位置所在的纬度。

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: 范围可以是从 -90.0 到 90.0。

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: 位置所在的经度。

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> class from latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: 从纬度和经度数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: 纬度和经度值必须对应于地球上的实际位置。

trans-unit.source: Latitude or longitude is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 纬度或经度超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Latitude.
trans-unit.target: 纬度。

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: 范围可以是从 -90.0 到 90.0。

trans-unit.source: Longitude.
trans-unit.target: 经度。

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0
The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: 海拔高度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: 可以是负值、0、正值；如果未知，则为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> class from latitude, longitude, and altitude data.
trans-unit.target: 从纬度、经度和海拔高度数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: 纬度和经度值必须对应于地球上的实际位置。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="latitude" />, <paramref name="longitude" />, or <paramref name="altitude" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="latitude" />、<paramref name="longitude" /> 或 <paramref name="altitude" /> 超出范围。

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: 位置所在的纬度。

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: 范围可以是从 -90.0 到 90.0。

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: 位置所在的经度。

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: 海拔高度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: 可以是负值、0、正值；如果未知，则为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 纬度和经度坐标的精度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 必须高于或等于 0。

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> property will be set to <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为此构造函数提供值 0，则 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> 属性将设置为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 海拔高度的精度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 必须高于或等于 0。

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> property will be set to <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为此构造函数提供值 0，则 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> 属性将设置为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: The speed measured in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: 速度以米/秒为单位进行测量。

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: 可以是负值、0、正值；如果未知，则为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: A negative speed can indicate moving in reverse.
trans-unit.target: 负的速度可以指示反向移动。

trans-unit.source: The direction of travel, rather than orientation.
trans-unit.target: 移动的方向而不是方位。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is measured in degrees relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: 此参数以相对于真北的度数为单位进行测量。

trans-unit.source: Must range from 0 to 360.0, or be <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 范围必须是从 0 到 360.0，或者为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> class from latitude, longitude, altitude, horizontal accuracy, vertical accuracy, speed, and course.
trans-unit.target: 根据纬度、经度、海拔高度、水平精度、垂直经度、速度和航向初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="latitude" />, <paramref name="longitude" />, <paramref name="horizontalAccuracy" />, <paramref name="verticalAccuracy," /> or <paramref name="course" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="latitude" />、<paramref name="longitude" />、<paramref name="horizontalAccuracy" />、 <paramref name="verticalAccuracy," /> 或 <paramref name="course" /> 超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the altitude of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 的海拔高度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 海拔高度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The altitude is given relative to sea level.
trans-unit.target: 相对于 sea 级别提供高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置行进方向（以相对于真北的度数为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: 行进方向（以相对于真北的度数为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The valid range includes values from 0.0 to 360.0, and `Double.NaN` if the heading is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 有效范围还包括到 360.0，值介于 0.0 和`Double.NaN`如果标题未定义。

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A> properties of the current location's <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将打印<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A>和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A>属性的当前位置<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course" /> 的设定超出了有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are equivalent, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 纯粹基于纬度和经度确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象是否等效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> object to compare to the calling object.
trans-unit.target: 要与调用对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> object is equivalent to the parameter, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 完全基于纬度和经度确定 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象是否与参数等效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 等效<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>对象具有相同<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>， <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>，和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>属性未用于确定相等性。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines if a specified <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 纯粹基于纬度和经度确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 是否等于当前 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 等效<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>对象具有相同<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>， <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>，和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>属性未用于确定相等性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> for the location to calculate the distance to.
trans-unit.target: 要计算到其距离的位置的 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the latitude and longitude coordinates that are specified by this <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> and another specified <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回由此 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 和另一个指定 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 指定的纬度和精度坐标之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the two coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 两个坐标之间的距离（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula is used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: Haversine 公式用于计算的距离。

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula accounts for the curvature of the earth, but assumes a spherical earth rather than an ellipsoid.
trans-unit.target: Haversine 公式地球的弯曲的帐户，但假定球状地球而不是椭圆体。

trans-unit.source: For long distances, the Haversine formula introduces an error of less than 0.1 percent.
trans-unit.target: 为远距离 Haversine 公式引入了小于 0.1%错误。

trans-unit.source: Altitude is not used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: 高度不用于计算的距离。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects that are equivalent have the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> 是等效的对象具有相同的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 等效<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>对象具有相同<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>， <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>，和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>属性未用于确定相等性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the latitude and longitude that is given by the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 给定的纬度和经度的精度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 纬度和经度的精度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy can be considered the radius of certainty of the latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: 准确性，可以被视为的纬度和经度数据的确定性的半径。

trans-unit.source: A circular area that is formed with the accuracy as the radius and the latitude and longitude coordinates as the center contains the actual location.
trans-unit.target: 作为为中心的 radius 的纬度和经度坐标的精度格式正确的圆形区域包含的实际位置。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy" /> 的设定超出了有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> does not contain latitude or longitude data.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 是否未包含纬度或经度数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> does not contain latitude or longitude data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 未包含纬度或经度数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that does not contain latitude or longitude data is equal to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>不包含纬度或经度数据等同于<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example verifies whether the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that corresponds to a location is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> before printing out its latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例验证是否<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>，它对应于一个位置是<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>之前打印出其纬度和经度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the latitude of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 的纬度。

trans-unit.source: Latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: 该位置所在的纬度。

trans-unit.source: Latitude can range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: 纬度的范围是从-90.0 到 90.0。

trans-unit.source: Latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator.
trans-unit.target: 北或从赤道扩展向南，纬度的单位为度。

trans-unit.source: Positive values are north of the equator and negative values are south of the equator.
trans-unit.target: 正值表示赤道以北，负值表示赤道以南。

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the latitude and longitude values that are obtained from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将打印从获取的纬度和经度值<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude" /> 的设定超出了有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the longitude of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 的经度。

trans-unit.source: The longitude.
trans-unit.target: 经度。

trans-unit.source: The longitude can range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: 经度的范围是从-180.0 到 180.0。

trans-unit.source: Longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: 子午线向东或，经度的单位为度。

trans-unit.source: Negative values are west of the prime meridian, and positive values are east of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: 值为子午线，以西，正值子午线以东为负。

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the latitude and longitude values that are obtained from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将打印从获取的纬度和经度值<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude" /> 的设定超出了有效范围。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects refer to the same location.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象是否指向相同的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are determined to be equivalent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 等效<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>对象具有相同<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>， <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>，和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>属性未用于确定相等性。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects correspond to different locations.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象是否对应于不同的位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> objects are determined to be different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象不相同，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 等效<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>对象具有相同<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>， <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>，和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>属性未用于确定相等性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以米/秒为单位的速度。

trans-unit.source: The speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: 以米/秒为单位的速度。

trans-unit.source: The speed must be greater than or equal to zero, or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 速度必须大于或等于零，或为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A> properties of the current location's <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将打印<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Course%2A>和<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed%2A>属性的当前位置<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Speed" /> 的设定超出了有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含纬度和经度的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the latitude and longitude, separated by a comma.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含纬度和经度（用逗号分隔）的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string representation returned by this method is intended only for debugging use.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的字符串表示仅供调试使用。

trans-unit.source: This method does not return any locale-specific formatting for latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不返回任何特定于区域设置格式的纬度和经度。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> object that has unknown latitude and longitude fields.
trans-unit.target: 表示含有未知纬度和经度字段的 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A> property can be used to verify whether a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> contains no data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A>属性可以用于验证是否<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>不包含任何数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example verifies whether the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that corresponds to a location is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> before printingout its latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例验证是否<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>，它对应于一个位置是<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>printingout 之前其纬度和经度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the altitude given by the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" />, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 给定的海拔高度的精度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: 海拔高度的精度（以米为单位）。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy" /> 的设定超出了有效范围。
